transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Hello sir, main se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Main Sarang bol raha hun sir IndiaMART se. Aapki service jo abhi hum logo ke sath mein live hui hai na jo IndiaMART wali hai uske regarding call kar raha hun. Ji boliye haan ek tarah hum log ke paas mein na aapke end se ek apne wo dala hoga mail IndiaMART pe to usko portal ko kaise use karna hai uske regarding.
Executive: To wo main Indian ke sath aapke waise bhi connect hone wala tha kyunki wo mere ko ID karana tha. Actually mera jo apna wala seller account hai mere ko hi assign hua hai and isko main hi handle karunga apne wale seller se.
Executive: To usi ke liye main ek bar aapke.
Customer: Boliye sir ji.
Executive: Ji ji ji. To sir ek to main ye janna chah raha hun aap IndiaMART ko like kaise use kar rahe hote hain phone mobile app se phone ya phir laptop ya desktop pe?
Customer: Main mobile se kar raha hun sir.
Executive: Aap mobile se karte hain. Achcha thik hai. To main aapko phir call pe hi thoda sa explain kar dun ki kaise matlab aapko utilize karna hai lead inquiry kaise isme apne ko consume karni hoti hai. Chaliye chaliye kar dijiye.
Executive: Ji ji. Thik hai to ek to main pehle aapse ye janna chah raha hun sir ek cheez isme hamara jo dealing area hai to like wo pan India rehne wala hai ya koi particular location hai jisko aap deal karna chahte hain ya target karte honge?
Customer: Haan India ke hisab se main kar leta hun domestic.
Executive: Nahi matlab pure all over India se kahin se bhi inquiry to wo relevant hogi hamare liye. Haan ok thik thik thik.
Executive: Right. To thik hai aap ek bar apna na mobile app phir open kar lijiye apne paas mein. Ek minute. Ji.
Customer: Haan kiya hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Isme na sir do teen cheeze hain jisko matlab aap jab bhi IndiaMART use kare na do hi teen tab hain jo aapne use karne hain basically. Sabse pehle to buylead aapko sabse bottom mein aapko show ho raha hoga buylead ke name se.
Customer: Hmm niche to hai buylead. Correct aisa aa raha hai. Niche haan jahan pe sabse niche left hand side pe home likh ke aa raha hoga usi ke right mein aa raha hoga buylead. Haan home aaya hai uske baad buyleads aaya hai. Correct correct wo jo buylead aa raha hai us pe aapne click karna hai. Haan. Thik hai. Buylead mein since aap bata rahe hain hum pan India deal karte hain to ab aap na thoda sa isme upar ki taraf aapko ek filter dikh rahe honge teen char jisme sabse top pe ek dikha hoga location ke name se. Achcha location category order value correct bio type and location wale pe click karna hai aapne pehle. Achcha.
Executive: Location pe click karke usko India pe select kar dena hai wo recommended pe ho rakha hoga. Achcha achcha achcha achcha. Hai na India kar diya achcha thik hai. Ab ye karne ke baad mein again jo location ke upar aapko dikh raha hoga relevant and usi ke just right mein relevant ke right mein hai recent.
Customer: Hmm keval sir category mein. Nahi India jahan pe likh ke aa raha hai na jo abhi ab jaise aapne India select kar diya to India ke just upar agar aap check karenge relevant and recent do option aa rahe hain. Relevant and recent haan haan relevant recent correct or tenders. Haan. Sahi hai. Tender aa raha hoga third hai na to usko aap recent pe aap click kar dijiye wahan pe. Recent pe. Recent pe haan. Achcha relevant relevant bhi keh raha tha. Ah nahi relevant relevant. Nahi relevant pe aata hai. Main batata hun relevant pe kya hoga wo jo aapko buylead wahan display karega wo us particular category ki karega jisme se aap zyada consume kar rahe honge relevant mein. Recent agar aap karoge to usme aapko overall sari display karega phir recent ke andar jitni bhi IndiaMART pe jitni bhi category aapne dal rakhi hai to wo sari aapko show karega recent ke andar. Relevant mein wo thode se filter kar deta hai ki jisme se aap zyada consume karte ho to aapko sirf wo wali wahan pe show karta hai. Achcha achcha. Thik hai. Hai na to ab aap recent pe kar dijiye. Abhi recent pe kar diya. Kar diya thik hai. Ab recent pe aapne kar diya to aapko jaise sabse pehle ek dikha hoga men's embroidered peshwari sentence ke name se. Ah haan pearl necklace set aa gaya pimpri chinchwad maharashtra se. Ah maharashtra yavatmal se hai na? Yavatmal nahi hai pimpri chinchwad maharashtra hai. Hmm ek minute. Kis uski hai ye product ki?
Customer: Pearl necklace set quantity one dozen pimpri chinchwad maharashtra aisa hai. Type of necklace set long colour white. Pehla pehla to wo aa gaya. Achcha pehle option mein ye wali show kar raha hai. Thik hai koi nahi. To ye hamare product se related hai ya jo abhi aap mere ko bata rahe hain ye wali? Haan pearl necklace set hamare hisab se aata hai ye. Hai na pearl necklace to hamare paas hai available. Haan. Thik hai but isme quantity kitni hai aapne batai one dozen? Ah. Haan one dozen quantity one dozen. One dozen na and location jo aap bata rahe hain ye kaunsi wali? Wo pimpri chinchwad maharashtra hai. Pune ke nazdeek. Pune ke paas mein hai. To ok pimpri wala jo hai ye pimpri chinchwad maharashtra thik hai. To one dozen isko na aap ab isme main aapko ek cheez bata dun ab aap dekhiye isi mein right side mein na aapko GST verified likh ke aa raha hoga. Right side pe. Haan jahan pe buylead show hoti hai wahi se thoda sa right mein agar aap dekhenge to ek likh ke aa raha hoga GST verified. No relevant buylead likha aa raha hai. Ah nahi isi isi particular wali pe jo abhi pearl necklace set aapne dekha hai na isi buylead ke GST verified show kar raha hai aapko wahan likha hua. Yahan pe sir GST verified pada hai nahi hai. Wo email aur GST hai. Haan wo to aa hi rahe jo number available mein show kar raha hai ye cheeze uske baad. Nahi aapne ye wali purchase kar li hai consume kar li? Jo contact buyer now pe jaake option aata hai. Kahan se mere ko samajh mein nahi aa raha. Jahan pe matlab GST ka nahi ye lead abhi aapne consume kari hai ya nahi kari filhal ye wali particular. Mere se kiya kiya hoga. Achcha ye kar liya hoga iske show nahi kar raha hoga apne ko otherwise wahan pe wo likh ke aata hai GST verified likh ke aata hai. Matlab GST verified ka basically matlab ye hai ki ye jo buyer hai inke paas mein GST available hai. To GST jin jin buyer ke paas mein available hota hai wo log aapke sath mein na bulk mein bhi deal kar sakte hain jaise yahan pe likh ke to sirf one dozen aa raha hai one dozen to matlab dekha jaye to bahut chota aapko lagega quantity. But ye particular lead jo hai pearl necklace set ki ye yahan pe GST verified show kar raha hai iske andar. To iske andar aap baat karenge to buyer phone email aur GST verified kar raha hai ye. Correct correct haan haan phone email aur GST but ek likh ke aa raha hoga wahan pe matlab GST ke sath. To isme jitni bhi leads aisi hongi na jo ye GST wali hongi jisme ye GST wala matlab jisme GST available hoga buyer ke paas mein. Achcha achcha. To ye isme chances hamesha zyada rehte hain ki bulk wali ho yahan pe irrespective of yahan pe quantity kitni mentioned hai kyunki quantity to sirf one dozen mentioned hai iske andar. Achcha achcha. Jab aap isme baat karenge to chances hain ki ye bulk wali ho sakti hai. Achcha. To isko contact buyer now pe jaake aap click karenge to aapko buyer ka contact detail yahan mil jayega mobile number email ID aur GST wagera sab kuch show karega. To aapne phir kya karna hai apne end se aapne sirf unko ek call karna hai buyer ko ki aise aise aapne IndiaMART se pearl necklace set ka requirement place kiya hoga. To buyer batayega aapne unse ki haan maine dala nahi dala jo bhi hai matlab. To agar bolega ki haan maine dala hai to phir aap unko bata sakte hain ki sir aap bataiye phir ki kitne pieces ki requirement hai kyunki yahan pe to sirf one dozen dikha hua hai but actual mein kitna hai wo aapko zyada thoda clarity na call pe de payega samne wala. To hum aise humare aise ek bar kiya tha to uske to apne product se aaye the to product usme usko shoot kiye the to apne product se apna apna catalog bhi aata hai usme thoda catalog mein lekin mere jo do char usme parts hai aur baki ke sab another parts hai aur uska wo uska IndiaMART ke number usme flash hota hai kya? Ah nahi wo direct aaya tha aapke paas mein koi call samne se? Nahi nahi ek aise aaya aane ke baad maine call kiya tha usko. Haan. Aur maine usi usi usi par agar contact buyer wahi dabaya to uske to aata hai. To uske kya rehta hai ki niche niche mein sirf khali line rehti hai usme apne apne product se rehte hain. Wo jo number number jo jata hai wo aap bata rahe ho aapka number nahi jata wo IndiaMART ka number ja raha hoga usme. Haan haan achcha achcha achcha IndiaMART ka number jata hai wo. Haan wo IndiaMART ka jata hai but aap usko na erase karke wahan pe wo option aata hai aap usko erase karke apna number add kar sakte hain usme. Jahan pe wo jo number aata hai na wo by default number hota hai wo CNS number rehta hai IndiaMART ka. Achcha achcha achcha. Wo quotation share jab aap karte ho to wahan pe aap usko hata ke aap apna personal number wahan pe dal sakte hain usme. Abhi main jo pearl jo isko click karke abhi contact buyer pe click karke. Haan haan haan aap phir ek bar contact buyer now pe click isme. Ho raha hai. Jaise aap karenge to again aapko wahan pe wo show karega wahi quotation.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know how to use IndiaMART.

- Enquired about IndiaMART number flashing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use IndiaMART.

- Explained about GST verified leads.

- Explained how to add personal number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None
